author: USA TODAY, Tom Daschle and Stacey Abrams, Opinion contributors
title: Tom Daschle and Stacey Abrams: Rural America needs coronavirus help
description: Expanding Medicaid and removing enrollment barriers would be a financial lifeline for rural health facilities while giving more people access to care.
content:
Expanding Medicaid and removing enrollment barriers would be a financial lifeline for rural health facilities while giving more people access to care.
As the coronavirus pandemic wreaks havoc on America, Congress has passed three bills to help the country we… [+6179 chars]
